prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Ednah Dow Littlehale Cheney Collection, Accession #7168, 7168-a, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: There is an autograph letter dated March 12, 1894 from Ednah Dow Cheney to Miss Lowell which refers to an enclosed note from Mrs. Richards, relates that the following day is the only time this month that she could visit the girls in the Institute, and that she is glad to have her in the [New England Women's] club. There is also an undated autograph of Cheney cut from a letter.
